name: Racial Equity Project (REP)
description: Pro bono legal support for Black-led nonprofit organizations through partnerships with community foundations
fullDescription: The Racial Equity Project provides free legal support to Black-led nonprofit organizations in California, helping strengthen their organizational capacity and mission.
whatTheyOffer:
- Pro bono corporate legal services for Black-led nonprofits
- Help with contracts, employment matters, and governance
- Legal review and risk assessment
- Board and compliance support
- Partnership with major law firms
howToGetIt:
1. Organization must be Black-led (Black executive director or majority Black board)
2. Must be a registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit
3. Apply through the JDC website
4. Describe your legal needs and organization's mission
5. If accepted, be matched with pro bono attorneys
keywords: REP, Racial Equity Project, Black-led nonprofit, pro bono, corporate legal, 501c3, contracts, employment law, governance, board compliance, law firm partnership
